title.rendered: ‘Best Healthcare & Wellness Program’ at India CSR Conclave

content.rendered: Smile Foundation’s Women Empowerment Initiative Wins ‘Best Healthcare and Wellness Program’ Award at India CSR and Sustainability Conclave 2024. Smile Foundation’s Swabhiman program, a women empowerment initiative, is a comprehensive, lifecycle approach to women’s empowerment. By addressing key areas such as reproductive and child health, nutrition, entrepreneurship, financial literacy, sustainability, and system strengthening, the program aims to transform the lives of women and their communities.
